nl.nikhef.jgridstart.passwordcache

Class PEMWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Writer
      • java.io.BufferedWriter
        • org.bouncycastle.util.io.pem.PemWriter
          • org.bouncycastle.openssl.PEMWriter
            • nl.nikhef.jgridstart.passwordcache.PEMWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, Flushable, Appendable, AutoCloseable

    public class PEMWriter
extends PEMWriter
    PEM file writer that works directory on files, integrated with PasswordCache.

    • Method Detail

      • writeObject

        public void writeObject(Object obj,
               String algorithm,
               char[] password,
               SecureRandom random)
                 throws IOException
        Write object encrypted to PEM encrypted.

        This sets the file permissions to user-accessible only when the supplied object contains a private key. For the rest it just calls its parent, PEMWriter.writeObject(java.lang.Object).

        Overrides:
        writeObject in class PEMWriter
        Throws:
        IOException

        public static void writeObject(File f,
               Object obj,
               char[] pw)

        Wrote single object to PEM encrypted with specified password.

        Stores password in PasswordCache as well.
